data.message:
JADED NATIONS
Tragically things don't just happen magically just for the asking ..
Prayers go unanswered in a world full of mishaps an' tragedies ...
Wars still breaking out, thousand more casualties ....
Children homeless in this ever growing society ...
The american dream turns into poverty.....
What ever happened to equality?
Families broken and shattered, morals don't exist or matter....
Mc Donalds making people fatter ... egos tattered ...
Homeland security, no more land of the free.
And to who are those to preach ... Money hungry ministries feeding off the weak, for a God they desperately seek.
Strong are the mere and meek.....
To whom I speak...
God give us ... for the government to take ...
We sew the seeds that they rape....
Unity stolen away by hate ....
And we blame the president now for our ancestors mistakes ...
Politics shaking hands, giving babies the Judas kiss, feeding us lies and handing out empty promises.
Common sense and wisdom replaced ... educated minds fill in the space...
It's a common place to be replaced .... 
This isn't humanity .... this is a human race.
Close your eyes, open your minds .. before it's too late ......
Scientist taking away faith .... by explaining it away .....
Mothers and fathers don't know how to be parents ....
Drugs make addicts incoherent ...
Prescribed medicine ... same shit, ain't no different.
Label us a disorder ... another prescription on order.
Things have gotten out of proportion ....
Killing babies before they are born, yea, they call it abortion.
What are people not absorbing?
Minds turned into mush .... thanks to presidents like George Bush....
Texas oil tycoon .... nothing more than a crazy ass loon.
Nothing in this life lasts forever, not even the sun or moon ....
Without one or the other the earth is doomed .....
Everyone seems out of reach, while we seek to reach Mars....
Taking money out ... instead of collecting it in jars ....
While the hungry and starving stay in harm.
The food we eat, raised in labs ... not on a farm ...
And this doesn't sound the alarm?
This my friends is not a rhyme, its a rap....
To open your eyes to all this crap....
Mother nature is a bitch .... and one day she will snap.....
Take caution to the wind, listen to the voice within ...
For if we don't take in account our own actions, a lot more shit can and will happen.
*The Devil's Angel * aka M 2 Da E ... MelaniE 2/6/15

replies.message: I love this rap... It's so good and also so true, my love for this is minus how much Eminem and his friend Superman do, lovin this how I rap it may sound like a poem, it wasn't til I was 8 years old Eminem then I didn't know him, why does these words like this how I flow, nobody knows, I might as well be a shady reborn, instead I'm darker, name is Silent Shadow, no dissin your words and no takin your name but I shout out to all those haters who is taking your name, having alot of pain, with problems and issues today, it's almost 12 am and already in making a bang with a bullet shooting and blasting at full speed and flying away, I could shoot myself out to the stars, blasting and flying by those stars like a comet almost touching planet Mars, went around Earth so many times, I can almost see the Madison Square Gardens streets lined up with cars, passing by Neptune, Jupiter and Saturn, like an asteroid belt bucklin around Uranus you'd only dream it would happen, this is a mere rap and a shout to all of my problems, I feel so much better now... My problems never goes away like my ass everyone has got em!
